name: Install_MACAQUE_DEMO_REST
author: AFNI Developers
description: Installs the demo archive for AFNI's resting state FMRI macaque-analysis demo.

inputs.description: Use wget to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl.
inputs.name: WGET

inputs.description: Use curl to download archive. Script chooses by default with preference for curl.
inputs.name: CURL

inputs.description: Download a version of the Demo in which the EPIs have been truncated to 75 points each. This makes the download size less than half of the original, and means the afni_proc.py processing will run faster.
inputs.name: Lite Version

output-files.description: Details of the demo archive after download.
output-files.name: README file
